title: [管理|娱乐]GuessTheNumber——在MC玩数字游戏[下载被度娘吃了][重磅汉化][1.6.2]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 104417372 于 2014-10-2 23:33 编辑 

介绍:猜数字游戏。随便猜一个数字，就可以获得物品，可以调高难度，玩家猜中结果后，就会获得文件夹中的奖励，如果猜错了，就会显示此号码错误，如果你不想1-5之间那么简单的数，你可以把max：5改为x数，即可提高难度，
在没事可作时，玩玩这个游戏，你会觉得很不错哦
我也是@神@Exsu @LZX6238 @leavessoft @Smaoll 求金粒

汉化（删除英文，复制粘贴汉化）（60%）
设置:
values:
  min: 1
  max: 5
  item-prize: 57
  # Your message if the value is incorrect
  wrong-value-message: '&c天啊，猜测错误了'
broadcaster:
  enable: true
  # Values below are set in seconds.
  # When you want it to start after the correct answer.
  start-delay: 60
  # How often you want the message announced (in seconds).
  interval: 120
  # Your broadcast message
  # Do NOT delete the min and max variables
  broadcast-message: '&2你猜测得数字必须是 %min% - %max%'
  # Your broadcast message for the winner
  # Do NOT delete the player variable
  broadcast-winning-message: '&9%player% &2获得了终极大奖'
Source复制代码

设置:values:
  min: 1[分钟]
  max: 5[如果设置5，那么只能输入1-5之间的数]
  item-prize: 57<<[获得钻石块]
  # Your message if the value is incorrect
  wrong-value-message: '&cWrong number, try again!'[猜测错误的提示]
broadcaster:[广播]
  enable: true[允许][false禁止]
  # Values below are set in seconds.[秒为单位]
  # When you want it to start after the correct answer.[当你想要知道正确数字]
  start-delay: 60[延迟60秒]
  # How often you want the message announced (in seconds).[多久后公布消息][秒为单位]
  interval: 120[2分钟]
  # Your broadcast message[你的广播消息]
  # Do NOT delete the min and max variables
  broadcast-message: '&2Guess a number between %min% - %max%'
  # Your broadcast message for the winner
  # Do NOT delete the player variable
  broadcast-winning-message: '&9%player% &2has won the prize!'
Source[玩家获奖的提醒]复制代码
安装:
放到plugins文件夹即可[然后配置config文件夹]

权限:
guess.use允许使用:猜测 数目
guess.admin允许GTN
guess.admin允许GTN信息

[注意：度娘吞了我的链接，等我回来补上]
指令:
/gtn start信息列表
/guess <value><<[猜测数字]提交你的答案或者/ G 数目 随机数字
/gtn start[重新设定广播]
[注意]:max: 5[最大数量][如果设置5，那么只能输入1-5之间的数]

[不一定准确]
[不会用，等等发图文！！]
下载:[回来会补上]    【怎么汉化:把config.yml放进GuessTheNumber文件夹
